links.title: Apple Continues to Prosper Even as It Starts to Resemble Its Dow Peers
links.description: As September arrives, the focus on Apple (NASDAQ:) seems to center around new products. Over the last few years, investors have come to expect the release of the latest version of the iPhone. According to rumors, many of its other products, such as the MacBook and possibly the Apple Watch, will also see updates.

links.title: Facebook to Remove Data-Security App From Apple Store
links.description: Facebook Inc. plans to pull its data-security app from Apple Inc.'s app store after the iPhone maker ruled that the service violated its data-collection policies, according to a person familiar with the matter.
